message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $13,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your position, Bob, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $11,000?
